review: I was explained fully the procedure to be followed for my root canal treatment. It was almost painless. Complete hygiene method was adopted. Ambiance was amazingly very comfortable and clean. All the apparatus were well placed. I could see my teeth xray on the screen very clearly. I knew what is going on during treatment. Dr Raju was very polite and friendly. Surprisingly the session was over without feeling tired. Simply Love ❤️ it.
A very fine, sensible, caring ,well expertise hands for the rootcanal treatment.His treatment is quite painless and fast.
Satisfied with the treatment ,would be better if he could speak bit loud and clear so that patients will have clear understanding on the procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ********* *********I highly recommend....with lots of patience and experience treatment is done....Super Good

Dr. Penmetsa was very patient in listening to the patients queries before the minor dental work. Very professional, sincere *** ****** ******* ** *** ***. The table side etiquettes,  cleanliness and ambience of this place is excellent.

I prefer him for all dental related issues.
He is very genuine and he will explain all the pros and cons clearly.

review: Doctor was polite, warm and punctual. He neatly explained the treatment procedure. He made sure I was comfortable and then only started treatment. Unlike many other doctors I have not seen him getting distracted with mobile phone and that's a nice trait I would love to see in a Doc.

I am really satisfied with the treatment,  even though I'm not aware of the dental issues till now but still the diagnosis n the way he did the treatment *** ****** *****  I really felt no pain after the treatment till this time.im not sure if it would start to pain later but as of now I'm really feeling good.  
  Good doc I would say.  Thanks to Swetha Reddy Garu.

Dr. Rama has been very patient and professional. Have done my root canal in 3 sittings, the experience has been quite smooth and never realised the pain at all. 

Definitely recommend Dr.Rama for root canal treatment.
A good doctor, who is focused on his work. The root canal took three sittings of about 30-40 minutes each, and minimal pain.
He's Good & soft spoken. Hopefully, he's done a good job. He attended us on time & was pretty thorough with his work.

Doctor was polite and friendly in answering my queries and took time to explain in detail the current situation of my dental problems and the treatment being applied .

Very good Doctor , Will definitely recommend to other people with dental problems .
